mapper.sql: user_id, username, password, mobile, nickname, regist_time, vip_state, vip_activetime, heading, invite_code, regist_code, user_state
mapper.update: update user set user_state=#{state} where user_id=#{id}

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regist_time = #{registTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
vip_state = #{vipState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vip_activetime = #{vipActivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
heading = #{heading,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_code = #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regist_code = #{registCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_state = #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regist_time = #{registTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vip_state = #{vipState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vip_activetime = #{vipActivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, heading = #{heading,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_code = #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regist_code = #{registCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_state = #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
